import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faTimes } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function DashboardProductInfo(props) { const [isCheckedSmall, setIsCheckedSmall] = useState(false); const [isCheckedMedium, setIsCheckedMedium] = useState(false); const [isCheckedLarge, setIsCheckedLarge] = useState(false); const checkedSize = (event) => { if (event.target.id === 1) { setIsCheckedSmall(true) } if (event.target.id === 2) { setIsCheckedMedium(true) } if (event.target.id === 3) { setIsCheckedLarge(true) } } console.log(isCheckedSmall) return (
